title: Videos (Highlights): When opening up the Videos - Highlights section all videos listed will be accurate, readable and display the correct icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: THEN all videos listed will be accurate, readable & display the correct icon

title: Videos (Highlights): When scrolling through the Video - Highlights section initially we will see a WBC placeholder icon before the video's thumbnail loads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
AND we have selected Highlights
AND we haven't scrolled through the Highlights list yet
custom_steps: WHEN we scroll through the highlights list
custom_expected: THEN we will briefly see a placeholder icon for each video before it's thumbnail loads

title: Videos (Highlights): When traversing through the Video - Highlights the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: THEN the formatting of the text & thumbnails appears consistent

title: Videos (Highlights): When we bring up the search options for a Team we will see that all players listed are in alphabetical order by their last name
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Highlights tab
AND we tap on the Team Selector
AND we tap on a Team
AND we tap on the "Search <Team> Highlights" search bar
custom_expected: THEN all players listed here will be in alphabetical order by their last name

title: Videos (Highlights): When utilizing the Search field under Highlights we are able to search and return results successfully
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Highlights tab
AND we type in the Search Menu
custom_expected: THEN the results returned are correct & accurate

title: Videos: Team picker button should default to the WorldBaseballClassic.com logo on initial launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN World Baseball Classic has just been installed
AND is being launched for the first time
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Video page through the Tab Bar
custom_expected:
THEN the filter button in the upper left will not be blank
AND the filter button will contain the WorldBaseballClassic.com label

title: Videos (Highlights): Verify that an App Crash does NOT occur when Entering Search Text and Scrolling Through Highlight Index
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Highlights tab
AND the user taps on the Search Field
AND the user waits for the Search Results to populate the Video Index
custom_expected: THEN scrolling up/down on the index does not cause the app to crash

title: Videos (Highlights): Video Highlights doesn't remember your scroll position
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video section in the tab tray
AND has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scrolls down to the bottom of the index after it has completed loading
AND taps on another tab in the tray (i.e. Scoreboard, News, etc...)
custom_expected:
THEN upon returning to the Videos page, the user will see the scroll position has been honored
AND will be exactly where the user left it

title: Videos (Highlights)]: Verify that searching for a certain name results in results that correlate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has tapped on the Video button in the icon tray
AND the user has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps: WHEN a text string is entered into the "Search Highlights" field
custom_expected:
THEN the result set will correlate to that which was entered by the user
AND will not present random results (in many cases the video title will not have anything to do what was entered by the user but still may be represented during playback. (i.e. If Miguel Cabrera was used as the search criteria but his name is not seen in the title, it may be because he was mentioned during the video playback.)

title: Videos (Highlights): Verify that if we switch to a different Team on News that team specific branding is visible
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Video
AND we tap on Highlights
AND we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu item
AND we tap on a random team
custom_expected:
THEN the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu item will be replaced by that teams icon
AND we will see that the search box states "Search <Insert Random Team Name> Highlights" instead of "Search Highlights"

title: Videos (Highlights): Verify that Video Highlights will have a depressed state when tapped on
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video tab
AND the user has tapped on Highlights
custom_steps: WHEN a highlight video cell is depressed
custom_expected: THEN the selected Highlight will darken slightly when tapped by the user

title: Videos (Highlights): iPhone Highlights always fade in
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page through the Tab Bar
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Highlights
AND scrolls up
OR scrolls down
custom_expected: THEN all previously loaded Highlights should not fade in when scrolling through the index

title: Videos (Highlights): Verify that if we don't have a "Favorite Team" set that if we access the "Team Selector Modal" that we will not see a "Favorite Team" header
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
AND we do NOT have a "Favorite Team" set
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Video
AND we tap on "Highlights"
AND we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will not see a "Favorite Team" header present

title: Videos (Highlights): Verify that if tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu item that no "Gear" icon appears next to each teams name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to "Video" 
AND we tap on the "Highlights" tab
AND we tap on the WorldBaseballClassic.com menu item
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a "Gear" icon does NOT appear next to each Teams Name

title: Scenario: Thumbnail Contents/Accuracy and Legibility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user examines the contents of the video thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will contain a title in white bolded font
AND the time/date stamp will be below the the title
AND a Share icon will be in the lower right-hand corner (if enabled)
AND all text present will be clear and legible

title: Scenario: Highlights Index Scrollable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to scroll down
AND the user attempts to scroll up
custom_expected:
THEN the scrolling in either direction will be possible
AND the inertial scrolling will be smooth

title: Scenario: Tapping on Highlight Thumbnail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user taps on the Highlights tab
custom_steps: WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the video playback for the selected highlight will begin

title: Scenario: Selecting a Team from the Teams Index/Filter Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video tab
AND the user has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps on the Team Selector
AND taps on a Team
custom_expected:
THEN a highlights index specific to the team will open
AND the WorldBaseballClassic.com filter button will be converted to a functioning button with the teams logo (This must be tested for all buttons on the team index)

title: Scenario: Ensure All Teams Present in Index
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video Index
AND we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we have tapped on the Team Selector
AND we are examining the contents of the Teams index
custom_expected:
THEN a cell for each of the teams will be present
AND there will be an WorldBaseballClassic.com button at the top of the index

title: Scenario: Adding / Removing Favorite Teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has added/removed a favorite team(s) in the More section
AND the user has tapped on the Video tab
AND the user has tapped on the Highlights tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Team Selector
custom_expected: THEN the changes made in the More should be reflected in the Team Selector for Favorite Teams

title: Scenario: Opening Favorite Teams Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has set up a Favorite Team(s) in the More section of the app
AND the user navigates to Video
AND the user taps on the Highlights tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Team Selector
AND the user taps on the Favorite Team that we have set
custom_expected: THEN the team video highlights index will open for that specific team

title: Scenario: Using Controller UI During Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has tapped on Video
AND the user has tapped on the Highlight tab
AND the user taps on a Video Thumbnail
AND the user notices that playback has started
custom_steps: WHEN the screen is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the video controller UI will appear onscreen
AND all button/controllers will perform their specified functions correctly

title: Scoreboard (Highlights): When selecting a game tile on the Scoreboard that has Highlights verify that we can play them while on a Carrier Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we are on a Carrier Connection
And we have selected the Scoreboard menu
And we have selected a Game Tile that has Highlights against it
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: Then when we select a highlight it will load up and play successfully on the Carrier Connection

title: Scoreboard (Highlights): When selecting a game tile on the Scoreboard that has Highlights verify that we can play them while on a WiFi connection
custom_preconds:
Given we are on a WiFi connection
And we have selected the Scoreboard menu
And we have selected the Game Tile that has Highlights against it
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: Then when we select a highlight it will load up & play successfully

title: Scoreboard (Highlights): When selecting a game tile on the Scoreboard that has Highlights verify that the video thumbnails that appear are correct and correspond to the video
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Scoreboard menu item
And we have selected a Game Tile
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_steps: When we scroll through the videos
custom_expected: Then the video thumbnails are correct & correspond to the video

title: Gameday (Highlights): Verify that Highlights will run successfully when selected from within Gameday while on a Carrier Connection
custom_preconds:
Given we are on a Carrier Connection
And we have selected the Gameday menu
And we have selected a Game Tile that has Highlights
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: Then the highlight that has been selected will load up & play successfully from within gameday on the Carrier Connection

title: Gameday (Highlights): Verify that Highlights will run successfully when selected from within Gameday while on a WiFi connection
custom_preconds:
Given we are on a WiFi connection
And we have selected the Gameday menu
And we have selected a Game Tile that has highlights
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_expected: Then the highlight that has been selected will load up & play successfully from within gameday

title: Gameday (Highlights): Verify that the Video Thumbnails that appear under the Highlights tab are correct and correspond to the video
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Gameday menu item
And we have selected a Game Tile
And we have selected the Highlights tab
custom_steps: When we scroll through the videos
custom_expected: Then the video thumbnails are correct & correspond to the video
